entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
